JojaAlwaysHasSeeds.Letter.Text: @,^^I am delighted to inform you that JojaMart will have seeds in stock for every season, all year round! Aren't you thrilled?^^I look forward to seeing you shopping at your local JojaMart!^^-Mr. Morris, Manager^Pelican Town JojaMart
JojaAlwaysHasSeeds.Letter.Title: Joja Has All Seeds Year Round
